UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: A potent antimicrobial peptide derived from the protein LsGRP1 of Lilium.
Literature.Author: Lin CH, Chang MW, Chen CY

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Agrobacterium tumefaciens C58C1(IC50=71.79µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis 28-4(IC50=23.32µg/ml),Escherichia coli DH5alpha(IC50=9.67µg/ml),Pseudomonas syringae pv. syringae 61(IC50=20.63µg/ml),Xanthomonas campestris XCP3(IC50=32.19µg/ml),Alternaria brassicicola Ac1(IC50=54.80µg/ml),Botrytis elliptica B061(IC50=86.13µg/ml),Botrytis cinerea B-134(IC50=58.26µg/ml),Colletotrichum acutatum HL1(IC50=17.39µg/ml)
